descriptions.subtitle: Frontend:
descriptions.desc: Starting project from scratch on Next.js 13, Atomic Design methodology for components, Sessions management (Login/Logut) with Cookies, Form validation with React Hook Form, CI/CD with Github actions, configuration of eslint, prettier and pre-commit (husky).

descriptions.subtitle: Technologies:
descriptions.desc: Next.js 13, TypeScript, React, Tailwind, Git actions.

descriptions.subtitle: ReactJS (Frontend):
descriptions.desc: Integration with Metabase (BI) in order to get charts, creation of home and dashboard professor pages based on Figma design, migration to consume database PostgreSQL managed by Directus (Headless).

descriptions.subtitle: NodeJS (Backend):
descriptions.desc: Microservices implementations oriented to AWS Lambda functions (Serverless), make business logic according to educational content, make Stored Procedures to optimize queries, connection to MongoDB and Postgres to data persistence.

descriptions.subtitle: Technologies:
descriptions.desc: Node.js, Express, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Github actions, Serverless, Swagger, Jest (Unit testing), Git.

descriptions.subtitle: Java Spring:
descriptions.desc: Create and modify microservices to the Davivienda (Bank) application with data encrypted. Main tasks executed in the project: Microservices implementations using containers, Request/Response encrypted.

descriptions.subtitle: Technologies:
descriptions.desc: SpringBoot, Docker, AWS, JUnit, RestAPI, Git.

descriptions.subtitle: React (Frontend):
descriptions.desc: Web application to manage full information about the natural or legal person in CCB (Camara de Comercio de Bogota): User Login/Logout with Cookies (consuming CBB Authentication services), create different pages showing full CCB user information, CRUD operations to manage CCB user information.

descriptions.subtitle: Java (Backend):
descriptions.desc: Create and modify CCB (Cámara de Comercio de Bogotá) application services: Microservices implementations, make business logic according to CCB rules, CRUD operations to CCB users with Postgres database.

descriptions.subtitle: Technologies:
descriptions.desc: React, CSS, HTML, TypeScript, Jest (Unit testing), SpringBoot, JUnit, RestAPI, Git.

descriptions.subtitle: JavaScript (Frontend):
descriptions.desc: Add new features to clinic history, forms creation and validation.

descriptions.subtitle: PHP and Java (Backend):
descriptions.desc: Web Services integrations: SOAP and REST, MySQL and Postgres databases management, Jasper report.

descriptions.subtitle: Technologies:
descriptions.desc: JavaScript Vanilla, HTML, CSS, Java, PHP, MySQL, SOAP, RestAPI, Git.

descriptions.subtitle: Angular (Frontend):
descriptions.desc: Angular 7, 8 management, Web Services integration, REST, Custom design with SASS preprocessor, Route handler, Pages creation.

descriptions.subtitle: PHP and Java (Backend):
descriptions.desc: Web Services integrations, SOAP and REST, MySQL and Postgres Databases management, Java EE, Jasper report.

descriptions.subtitle: Technologies:
descriptions.desc: JavaScript Vanilla, HTML, CSS, Angular, Java, PHP, MySQL, SOAP, RestAPI, Git.

descriptions.subtitle: JavaScript (Frontend):
descriptions.desc: REST integrations (PayU, MailChimp, Alegra), Pages creation, CSS Animations, Responsive design of Web Pages and Landing Pages, JQuery and Bootstrap utilization.

descriptions.subtitle: PHP (Backend):
descriptions.desc: Web Services integrations, SOAP and REST, MySQL Database management, Linux server management, Git versioning, Scrum agile methodology, CRM based on Vtiger.

descriptions.subtitle: Technologies:
descriptions.desc: JavaScript Vanilla, CSS, HTML, JQuery, PHP, MySQL, SOAP, RestAPI, Git

descriptions.subtitle: Through the professional career:
descriptions.desc: Linux, C++, Java, RaspberryPi.
